# Welcome to first nbdev tutorial
> simple tutorial to say hello


Proj trial 

## Install

`pip install nbdev_tutorial`

## How to use

calling method

```python
say_hello("Neha")
```




    'Hello Neha!'



```python
add_two_numbers(1001,2)
```




    1003



```python
subtract_two_numbers(100,5)
```




    95
